p: ZRR has a wide range of effects. It is often used in combination with other Chinese medicines but is generally not used alone. In the major prescription books in ancient China, Shang Han Za Bing Lun, there are 71 prescriptions containing ZRR, including 38 in the Treatise on Shang Han Lun and 33 in the Outline of Jin Gui Yao Lue. The parts of formulations are shown in Table 1.
